Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A bank guard is a towering bulky fox, with short, wirey dark brown fur, and a head of shaved silky light brown hair shaved. He has a goatee which is trimmed. Green eyes are set above flaring nose and a large mouth, complete with uneven lips. Long ragged nails, on rough hands, and jagged feet are also visible. You also note his long ears, heavy eyebrows and short shaggy tail.
A bank guard is a a towering bulky fox, with short, wirey dark brown fur, and shaved silky light brown hair shaved. He has a goatee which is trimmed.
